Name: Chariz-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Charmander, Charmeleon, and Charizard.  Swap a Chariz-Claw and a Chariz-Fang for a Chariz-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
